subject: Relationships
title: Trust After Infidelity
description: Learn Trust After Infidelity in one minute.

hook.text: He cheated. She stayed. Five years later, their marriage is stronger than before. Is that possible? Yes â€” and it's hard.

buildup.text: About 60% of couples stay together after infidelity. Of those who do the repair work, many report stronger bonds.

discovery.text: Rebuilding requires transparency, accountability, and patience. The unfaithful partner must tolerate distrust.

twist.text: The betrayed partner doesn't 'get over it.' They build a new trust on top of the wound. The old trust is gone forever.

climax.text: Trust after infidelity isn't restored. It's rebuilt from scratch â€” different, harder, and sometimes more resilient.

punchline.text: After infidelity, trust isn't restored. It's rebuilt from scratch, if at all.
